icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Font Manager." heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Integrated with Fonto Plugin to manage your premium web fonts easily. Compatible with Google Fonts, Typekit, MyFonts, Fonts.com, self-hosted fonts, and others.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Ffonto.html||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][loprd_carousel_column column_background_color="rgb(255, 255, 255)" column_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" css=".vc_custom_1600777334066{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_row_inner row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-clear_all" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Navigation variety." heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Omnis Theme comes with two main navigation layouts. Each layout includes plenty of settings to customize it to your needs.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Fnavigation.html|target:_blank"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][loprd_carousel_column column_background_color="rgb(255, 255, 255)" column_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" css=".vc_custom_1600777334066{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_row_inner row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-devices_other" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Super fast performance" heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Optimized at every level to perform blazing-fast on all devices. Includes built-in image optimizer.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Fimage-optimization.html|target:_blank"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][loprd_carousel_column column_background_color="rgb(255, 255, 255)" column_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" css=".vc_custom_1600777334066{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_row_inner row_flex_wrap="nowrap"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-grid_on" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Tailored Grid System" heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Based on bootstrap grid system with unique solutions like adjustable column gaps and 'smart' paddings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/loprd_carousel_column][/loprd_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section section_content_txt_skin="txt--light" section_background_color="#1a1a1a" section_background_image="11377" section_background_image_settings="attachment:fixed" section_background_image_overlay="linear-gradient(0deg, #1a1a1a 5%, rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.98) 20%, rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.55) 100%)"][vc_row row_container_height_custom="50vh" row_container_alignment_v="center" row_column_alignment_h="center" row_column_content_alignment_v="center"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8"][vc_column_text animation="scale-up" animation_duration="1200"]

Take your website to [omnis_current_year]!

item.title: Titlebar - Large Subtitle - Simple
